Package javelin.controller.terrain.hazard

Class PartyHazard

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.terrain.hazard.Hazard
      • javelin.controller.terrain.hazard.PartyHazard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cold, Dehydration, FallingTrees, Heat
    public abstract class PartyHazard
extends Hazard
    This is a helper class for hazard effects that affect all squad members.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • save

        protected abstract boolean save​(int hoursellapsed,
                                Combatant c)
        Returns:
        true if the character is able to ignore the penalty.

      • affect

        protected abstract java.lang.String affect​(Combatant c,
                                           int hoursellapsed)
        Damages/penalizes a Combatant who failed it's save. Ideally should never outright kill a character since it's no fun to lose an unit passively (non-lethal damage). Also makes it a bit easier to code, without having to worry about Ressurections and such.
        Parameters:
        c - Penalizes/damages this character.
        Returns:
        description of what happen. Should contain the character's name.

      • hazard

        Called when a hazard happens.
        Specified by:
        hazard in class Hazard
